info.name: NitroType v3 Classic Skin
info.description:
The first and only FULL skin for Nitro Type v3, download today and be the first of your friends to have a themed v3!!!

This is the product of nearly 30 hours of work, it's an attempt at bringing the v2 aesthetics to v3 while retaining the modern feel and features. I've expanded the material style nearly site-wide and made it a nice grey/black with red accent. I've also changed several visual elements to be more pleasing to the eye or less obtrusive. There are some things I can't seem to theme so you may notice the occasional standard color. If you run into any issues or something that's broken contact me on discord at dv0rak#0001. Thanks for trying it out!

ALL NON GOLD MEMBERS!!! This theme will correct the centering issue NT currently has due to ad placements.
info.additionalInfo:
This theme is in continual development, make sure to check for updates frequently.

6/7/19 - v1.0 - Initial release
6/7/19 - v1.1 - Fixed friend race chat colors
6/10/10 - v1.2
     -Themed text boxes
     -garage edit notification
      -centered non-gold account view. 
      -Possibly removed ads site-wide (hard to test, NT has not placed ads on the site yet)
6/10/19 - v1.3
     -Optimized profile view for non gold accounts
     -majority of text now red (in preparation for user customizable colors)
     -corrected several news issues
     -race results user box now red
6/10/19 - v1.3.1
     -rolled back text color changes due to user feedback
6/10/19 - v1.4
     -guest racer blue background fix
     -garage active car now red
     -leaderboard/team board now red
6/10/19 - v1.4.1
     -accordion buttons (support page)
     -corrected moderator comment color on news
6/11/19 - v1.4.2
     -popup tooltips now red (nitros, remove friend, etc)
6/11/19 - v1.5
     -stat graph selection line and popup now themed
     -paint car button (on click) fixed
     -fixed some links that were blue on hover
     -racer popup on leader board now themed
     -news comments now grey
     -season/team boards now grey
6/11/19 - v1.5.1
     -more transparent red on tooltips
6/12/19 - v1.6
     -tire treads now have transparent background
     -black background widened 4px to better match width of cards
6/12/19 - v1.6.1
     -themed notifications (friend request, race request, money received)
     -decreased size of notifications
6/13/19 - v1.6.2
     -mystery box popup new grey, removed white in bottom left, changed gold gradient slightly 
6/14/19 - v1.6.9 (heh)
     -race loading screen now red tinted rather than blue
     -animation on race load now red
6/14/19 - v1.6.9.1
     -slightly tweaked gradient on loading screen
6/14/19 - v1.7
     -achievements not yet earned now grey
     -white removed from unclaimed achievements
6/28/19 - v1.7.1
     -dealership cards now grey
